text: be’alahina bemech’ereshawi k’eni yemiyaminutini hizibochi alahinina melikitenyawini yemikerakerutini sewochi፤ abatochachewi፣ weyimi lijochachewi፣ weyimi wenidimochachewi፣ weyimi zemedochachewi bihonumi inikwa yemiwedaju honewi atagenyachewimi፡፡ ineziya belibochachewi wisit’i iminetini ts’ifwali፡፡ ke’irisumi behone menifesi degifwachewali፡፡ kesirochachewimi wenizochi yemifesubachewini genetochi bewisit’achewi zewitariwochi sihonu yagebachewali፡፡ alahi ke’inerisu wedwali፡፡ ke’irisumi wedewali፡፡ ineziya ye’alahi hizibochi nachewi፡፡ nik’u! ye’alahi hiziboche inerisu minyotachewini yemiyagenyu nachewi፡፡
